thread.title_full: Pastor Kanyari Wails, Laments after Being Slammed By Kenyans: "Pressure Itaniua" - Tuko.co.ke

author: Caren Nyota
title: Pastor Kanyari Wails, Laments after Being Slammed By Kenyans: "Pressure Itaniua" - Tuko.co.ke
text:
Home Entertainment Celebrities Celebrities Pastor Kanyari Wails, Laments after Being Slammed By Kenyans: "Pressure Itaniua" Friday, May 24, 2024 at 7:16 AM by Caren Nyota 3 min read Pastor Kanyari apologised to Kenyans after he was bashed for entertaining TikToker Faith Peters, who gifted him condoms in church The controversial man of God begged for forgiveness and even went live on TikTok wailing uncontrollably as he lamented being targeted Kanyari claimed he had high blood pressure and was unable to sleep following the backlash from social media PAY ATTENTION: TUKO is in WhatsApp Channels now! Subscribe and read news in favourite messenger.
Pastor Kanyari has constantly apologised to Kenyans following the controversial condom gift he was gifted by TikTok .
Pastor Kanyari wailed during a TikTok live, claiming he was distressed after being criticised for entertaining a woman who gifted him condoms in church. Photo: Prophet Kanyari.
Source: TikTok
Pastor Kanyari sheds tears during TikTok live On Thursday, May 24, Kanyari went live on TikTok to continue to defend himself, asking for forgiveness.
PAY ATTENTION: Don't miss trending Kenyan news. Follow TUKO.co.ke on Twitter!
The man of God wept as he wiped tears and sweat during the live as he sang Unastahili Kuabudiwa worship song.
Read also
Video of Kenyans in Saudi Arabia Singing Kikuyu Worship Songs During Unique Church Service Emerges
"What can I do my God?" Kanyari cried. "Niko na magari ziko nje niko hapa niko na pressure, niko na mashamba ziko nje, niko hapa niko na pressure. Imefika masaa ya kulala silali niko hapa na pressure. Sitalala. Niko chini ya magoti nanyenyekea (I have cars outside, I'm here under pressure. I have pieces of land outside, I'm here under pressure. It's time to sleep, but I can't, I'm here under pressure. I won't sleep. "'m on my knees and humble)," he said. Here is the video :
Earlier, Kanyari apologised to Kenyans after he was bashed for entertaining Faith, who gifted him condoms during a live church service.
"I'm apologising for what happened last Sunday," he said. The controversial preacher defended himself, saying he was not aware of what was wrapped in the newspaper he was given.
The father of two said he was shocked.
Read also
Pastor Kanyari Apologises after Entertaining Lady who Gifted Him Condoms in Church: "I'm Sorry"
"Mimi nimefanyia Mungu kazi for 30 years na sijawahi ona kitu kama hio. Hakuna mtu akoseangi, msichana alikosea na sikutaka kumpiga au kumtusi coz washirika wangempiga (I have worked for God for 30 years and have never seen anything like that. Nobody is perfect, the girl made a mistake, and I didn't want to hit or insult her because the congregation would have attacked her)," he said.
Kanyari claimed it was the lady's first time at his church, and she was not saved.
"I'm sorry. Naomba msinisamehe kwa jambo lililotekea. Jambo kama hilo halitatokea tena, (Please forgive me for what happened. It will not happen again)," he begged. Pastor Kanyari slams TikTokers On Sunday, May 19, 200 TikTokers attended the Salvation Healing Ministry church service; some are reported to have misbehaved.
Faith gifted Kanyari a small package wrapped in a newspaper and asked him to unwrap it. Upon opening it, Kanyari, who was standing at the pulpit, showed the congregation three items: Kotex tampons, Arimis petroleum jelly and a packet of condoms. Faith also professed her love for the pastor, saying she was ready to settle with him.
Read also
William Ruto Wows Kenyans after Unleashing His Romantic Side in US: "Ukirudi Usiwache Kumshika Hivo"
Kanyari went live on TikTok on the night of Tuesday, May 21, to clear the air claiming TikTokers disrespected him when they attended his church.
